description: This little "retro" experimental game lets you explore a small museum, called "The Sunday Museum". You can walk around and interact with either the signs or tv sets in each room.

name: Jolly Laughter
description: An interactive Christmas card.

name: Sakura Trick: Special Edition
description:
The story revolves around Haruka and Yuu, two inseparable friends during high school, who by a cruel twist of fate are separated in high school and placed in completely opposite seats.

Forced to spend more time with their classmates, these girls decide to share "something special" to maintain their relationship despite the obstacles... that "something" being a kiss. From that kiss these girls begin to go deeper into their relationship.

name: Boardwalk Memories
description: Enjoy a casual stroll on the boardwalk and play some classic boardwalk games, including the always popular Fascination.

name: Heir
description: Sin descripción

name: The Game
description: With over 40 levels, over 60 characters, over 3 minutes worth of cutscenes, over 2 months of development, over 9000 jokes, over $153 spent on coffee, and over 6 statistics made up, you'd think I'd have a better title.

name: Replaying: The Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Vegetable Game
description: Sin descripción

name: God Simulator
description:
God Simulator is an Economic Strategy-Simulation Game, putting you in charge of, well, the entire world!

Become an omnipotent observer in this holyrious adventure and decide the fate of all those who inhabit the world, through a powerful control panel that receives everyone’s prayers. What kind of God will you become - will you hear their pleas and pilot this planet to a paramount of peacefulness or will you take a step back, letting Earth erode into ultimate chaos?

name: Lost Away
description: Lost Away is a first-person survival action game set light-years away from our solar system. After a spaceship crash, the protagonists find themselves the lone survivors on a mysterious planet where nothing is quite as it seems. Use all of your tools, tech and skills to set a base camp, discover the planet's previously undiscovered secrets and return to Earth alive.

name: Serial Hunter
description: Serial Hunter, an action-adventure thriller, invites you into the twisted mind of the self-proclaimed avenger. Play as John Doe, an investigative journalist who uses information gathered at work to rid the public of the most degenerate individuals. And the cleansing methods are very diverse... As an investigative journalist, you have access to many tools that allow you to track down the incarnate evil. Use police frequency monitoring, whistleblower services and connection to municipal surveillance to establish the identity and whereabouts of your target. Only then will you plan a perfect execution.

name: Surviving the Humans
description: Surviving the Humans is a 2D point-and-click adventure-style video game. Face the humans, who will seek to eliminate you in any way, while you learn what it is to be a zombie.

name: Citywars Tower Defense
description: Citywars Tower Defense is a mix between a survival game and a tower defense. Craft your tools, gather resources to build your towers, fight incoming monsters, level up your weapons each with unique skill trees, enchant your armor and play with your friends coop or split screen and more!

name: McPixel 3
description: McPixel 3 is a mind-blowing save-the-day adventure that sees the titular wanna-be hero avert one disaster after another at every turn using unconventional yet entertaining methods of mayhem.

name: Prose & Codes
description: Prose & Codes is an indie puzzle game. Decode the wit, wisdom, and wonder of literature's finest works through deceptively simple ciphers. Decode 350 hand-selected excerpts from literary classics both well-known and obscure and get a taste of 7 beloved genres, from nostalgic children's stories to bone-chilling horror.

name: illWill
description: Eliminate hordes of monsters in illWill, a thrilling first person shooter. The game features breathtaking locations filled with hundreds of monsters and polished gameplay containing all the best of old school shooters. You have a variety of weapons at your disposal - from a double barrel shotgun, warm and beloved as grandma's soup, to a soul ripper with gameplay mechanic unseen before.

name: Tsos
description: Tsos is an indie survival horror game made for the HauntedPS1 "Summer Of Shivers" gamejam. A gamepad is recommended for a better experience.

name: NecroNightmare
description:
You're in your house, but you've been home alone for days, you decide to enter into the mysterious basement.

You find a mysterious book, strange things will happen.

name: SkyRider
description: SkyRider is a 2 player co-op action puzzle platformer game. One player will control Noki, jumping, fighting and collecting energy for his drone. The other one will control that drone: "R.O.B.O.T.O", making platforms, energy shields and shooting.

name: AH3AD: Retrowave Runner
description: AH3AD: Retrowave Runner is a 2D platformer game with a mix of runner and puzzle genres. Reshape the levels using the power of color-switching. Quick thinking and perseverance will be key to achieve victory.

name: Fallen London: Five Minutes to Midday
description: Five Minutes to Midday is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. Five Minutes to Midday was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the first story in the Season of Revolutions.

name: Fallen London: The Chimney Pot Wars
description: The Chimney Pot Wars is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Chimney Pot Wars was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the second story in the Season of Revolutions.

name: Fallen London: The Calendar Code
description: The Calendar Code is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Calendar Code was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the third and final story in the Season of Revolutions.

name: Fallen London: Where You and I Must Go
description: Where You and I Must Go is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. Where You and I Must Go was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the first entry in the Season of Wrecks.

name: Fallen London: Our Lady of Pyres
description: Our Lady of Pyres is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. Our Lady of Pyres was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the second entry in the Season of Wrecks.

name: Fallen London: The Final Curtain
description: The Final Curtain is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Final Curtain was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the third and final entry in the Season of Wrecks.

name: Fallen London: The Persona Engine
description: The Persona Engine is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Persona Engine was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the first entry in the Season of Skies.

name: Fallen London: The Twelve-Fifteen from Moloch Street
description: The Twelve-Fifteen from Moloch Street is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Twelve-Fifteen from Moloch Street was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the second entry in the Season of Skies.

name: Fallen London: The Century Exhibition
description: Addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for February, 2017. Third and final entry in the Season of Skies.

name: Fallen London: The Clay Man's Arm
description: The Clay Man's Arm is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Clay Man's Arm was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the first entry in the Season of Stones.

name: Fallen London: The Heart, the Devil and the Zee
description: The Heart, the Devil and the Zee is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Heart, the Devil and the Zee was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the second entry in the Season of Stones.

name: Fallen London: Hojotoho!
description: Hojotoho! is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. Hojotoho! was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the third and final entry in the Season of Stones.

name: Fallen London: The Web of the Motherlings
description: The Web of the Motherlings is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Web of the Motherlings was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the first entry in the Season of Ruins.

name: Super Baseball League
description:
Sharing the same universe of its predecessor Homerun Clash, Super Baseball League is a real-time multiplayer casual sports PvP game based on the competitive, quick, fun, skill-based baseball. The game offers short game sessions packed with the essence of real professional baseball.

In Super Baseball League, players can compete other players all around the world in a 1 vs 1 single inning tiebreaker match. Gameplay is fast and exciting, with simple batting/pitching controls and various game modes: 1vs1 Super League, World League, Situational Training, etc. Also, randomized match settings such as Home/Away decision, batting order, and runners on base keep the game fresh and competitive.

Super Baseball League also offers various characters including the popular sluggers of Homerun Clash, with unique skills and abilities. The goal is to build up the best dream team and climb up the player rankings. To achieve the goal, players can customize their characters with level-ups, upgrades, star promotion, stat assignment, and more.

name: Kyoro-chan no Purikura Daisakusen
description: Kyoro-chan no Purikura Daisakusen is an Action game in which the player controls the parrot in different levels. During those levels he will face different animal enemies: Like monkeys and other bizarre creatures. The player got different attack movement and even some special attacks when he finds different kind of balloons.

name: Saint Spell's Love Guide to the Magical Student's Spellbook
description: Saint Spell's Love Guide to the Magical Student's Spellbook is a dating and friendship simulator of the famous magical conservatory, Saint Spell! In your first week of school, meet 29 magical students, practice some special spells, brew a love potion, or simply slack off... The game contains 14,051 dialogue blocks, containing 155,452 words, 504 menus, 140 images, and 35 screens.

name: UpRunner
description: Uprunner is a free-to-play MMO vertical speedrunner. Win lobbies or create your own maps to earn coins and buy unique randomly generated skins!

name: Warcraft III: Nirvana
description: Warcraft III: Nirvana is a melee mod for WarCraft III TFT. It adds several custom races and can be played on any melee map. This project is focusing on renovating WC3, expanding its playability while keeping it well balanced.

name: Fallen London: All Things Must End
description: All Things Must End is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. All Things Must End was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the second entry in the Season of Ruins.

name: Taffy Tales
description: In “Taffy Tales” you will see the story of a regular guy with a split personality and his journey in a small town where almost every common citizen has his uncommon dark side. Dozens of characters with their families and relations, an original story, lots of side quests and a lot of adult art awaits you!​

name: Knight's Raid: Lost Skytopia
description: Knight’s Raid: Lost Skytopia is a fantasy anime card game with generous benefits and innovative gameplays. Players will step into the Karlmoss, which is a world full of mysterious stories and undiscovered treasures.

name: The Dark Dwellers
description: The Dark Dwellers is a difficult Souls-like side-scrolling action game driven by a strong narrative and Metroidvania-esque exploration. Fight and crawl your way through this subterranean land, collect unique weapons, learn devastating Blood Magic spells and attempt to end The Maddening Curse.

name: Novalie
description: Surreal horror themed visual novel, with lots of branching paths, blood, tears and twisted pitch-black humour. You're playing as Ashia, who's forced to marry her slimy uncle, suffering from surreal nightmares at night. Then she meets Novalie. And then things gets really strange.

name: Racing Drift
description:
This game still has something to show, and it will definitely surprise you...
By the way, you should get used to the way cars are moving here :)

Good Luck and remember to have fun!

name: Down the Deep
description:
In this game, you can feel like an undper, and most importantly stay alive!

Here you should pay attention to almost everything! Control your oxygen level, watch out for obstacles, do not bump into walls. And remember: Keep Up!

name: Try Harder
description: Sprint headlong into certain death and put your mobile reflexes to the test.

name: Bonk's Adventure: Arcade Version
description: Developed by Kaneko and released in 1994, Bonk's Adventure: Arcade Version is based on the original Bonk games for the TurboGrafx-16 and PC Engine. However, the gameplay and level design are drastically different to suit arcade style play.

name: Catafalque
description: Catafalque is a first-person survival horror game. Inspired by the masterpieces of the PSOne era, this is a love letter to games of yore. The game is portrayed through simple yet detailed retro graphics carefully arranged with the complexity and depth of modern games, mixed with hardcore and unforgiving, yet fair, mechanics. Explore the unfamiliar world around you, filled with details and secrets to uncover, while engaging in rewarding exploration to uncover the deep lore of this wicked universe.

name: Fallen London: Mistress of the Skies
description: Mistress of the Skies is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. Mistress of the Skies was originally published as an Exceptional Story.

name: SCP: Vacation
description: 1-4 Player PvP Party-Board Game with Minigames based in the SCP Foundation universe

name: Mima and Nina's Chocolate Workshop
description:
Mima and Nina's Chocolate Workshop is a chocolate-making visual novel. Test different ingredients and decorations to tailor your chocolates to the tastes of the people you want to give them to.

There's your friend in the garden club, the tennis club captain, and the school president... But you only have one bag of chocolates to give!

Who will you give your chocolates to this Valentine's Day?

name: The Witch-in-Training and the Magic Seal
description:
The Witch-in-Training and the Magic Seal is an adventure puzzle game where you control Ena and her party to escape the insides of a magical seal, all while uncovering its secrets.

The game features heavy focus on cutscenes and dialogue to slowly unravel the story and backgrounds of the various featured characters.

name: Abermore
description: Inherit the role of a mythical thief and pull off the heist of the century in Abermore, a first-person RPG where stealth is your key to fame and fortune. You have 18 days to ransack houses, sell stolen loot, acquire new gear and form alliances to prepare for the ultimate heist.

name: A Highland Song
description: Enter the Highlands. Lose yourself. Find harmony. Reach the sea. A narrative adventure with rhythm and survival elements, from the creators of Heaven’s Vault and 80 Days.

name: Monopoly Poker
description: Welcome to the official Texas Hold'em poker game of Monopoly. Are you ready to conquer the poker empire?

name: Hanna in a Choppa 3
description: Take flight in the latest installment of the hugely popular Hanna in a Choppa series of games. Guide Hanna through 10 bonkers levels, each with hidden secrets and achievements. Train your pet elephant Stompy, steal honey from pesky bees, humiliate upgraded OXOBot at his own game, and of course, The Button makes a spectacular return.

name: Meteorite V Base
description:
Meteorite V Base is a game submitted to the GDevelop Game Jam 2022 by nathandev.

In the game, you have to defend your base from many meteorites falling from the sky, using blocks you place around the map. Every time you block a meteor, you get a point, but if you don't block it, you lose 15 health and the base starts to break. You also lose out on points. Get below 0 health and you've lost. Good luck defending your base!

name: Handkerchief
description:
Handkerchief, developed Opus Corp. / Ask, Co., Ltd., published by XSIV Games (Stealth Media Group).
Side-scrolling run'n'gun similar to Metal Slug or Jazz Jackrabbit. Shoot, jump, use weapons and vehicles to combat the enemy army. Single or multiplayer.

name: AfterHours
description: Experience psychological horror in a large abandoned hospital. Hide, explore and survive from a mysterious creature living in the ruins of this hospital.

name: SugarKiss!
description: Adult romance connected by cigarettes!

name: Turbo Driving Racing 3D
description: Conquer street and sky in Turbo Driving Racing, a mix of high-octane driving and endless racing. Barrel through packed streets, avoid crashes, take down traffic cars, pick up coins and perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts! The game will challenge even the most skilled racing fans.

name: BFDIA 5b
description: An unfinished continuation to BFDIA 5a; the FreeSmarters got trapped inside Evil Leafy and scattered all around her. Help Book pass through lots of tightly designed puzzles in order to reunite with her alliance and escape Evil Leafy!

name: Amayui Labyrinth Meister
description: Sin descripción

name: Shin Koihime Musou Tenka Touitsu-den
description: Sin descripción

name: Semantle
description: A daily word-guessing game where each guess must be a word (of any length) or short phrase. The game will tell you how semantically similar it thinks your word is to the secret word. Unlike that other word game, it's not about the spelling; it's about the meaning.

name: Dungleon
description: A daily guessing game inspired by Wordle where the player must place heroes, monsters, and treasure within a 'dungeon'.

name: The Secret of Monkey Island: Recoded
description:
30 Years of Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's Revenge....
Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's Revenge turned thirty. The extraordinary second chapter of the series of "point and click" graphic adventures - born thanks to the intuition and the inimitable comic streak of Ron Gilbert, Dave Grossman and Tim Schafer (LucasArts), continues to thrill many nostalgic players even today.

To celebrate this important anniversary with great fanfare, Daniele Spadoni invite you play at a timeline never seen before, an adventure that will have no end.

name: Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story
description:
Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story is the original Japanese version of the game released in other regions under the title of Nintendo World Cup. The Japanese version is part of the Kunio-kun/Nekketsu High series.

The game was originally released under the title of Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball Bu: Soccer-hen, but has since been localized as Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story.

name: Who's That Pokémon?
description: A simple HTML5 game that generates silhouettes from images and gets the user to guess the name of the Pokémon shown.

name: Downtown Nekketsu Story
description:
Downtown Nekketsu Story is the original version of the game known as River City Ransom.

The game was first released as Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, but has since been localized as Downtown Nekketsu Story.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location VR
description:
A VR recreation of the original Fnaf: Sister Location game.

Take control of a late-night technician who must do maintenance work on active machinery and animatronics.

name: Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun
description:
Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun is the home console port of Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun for the Family Computer.

The game was first released as Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun, but has since been localized under the new title of Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun.

name: Renegade
description: The American port of the Japanese arcade game Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun.

name: Sokonuke Taisen Game
description: In this strange party game you must compete in simple yet strange events such as inflating balloons, morphing into dragons, etc., while at the same time protect your partner from 'harmless' pain inducers such as razor-sharp buzzsaws and bombs! Features nice graphics and hectic gameplay!

name: So Far, So High
description: The main task of the game is to get out of a deep hole by jumping on platforms and being careful of various enemies. On each floor there is a different number of chests, when opening which we can drop power ups and weapons. With each floor, the pit becomes deeper, and the enemies become more resistant. Good luck, you'll need it.

name: MegaFactory Titan
description: A factory building game set on Saturn's moon Titan. Explore an infinite procedural world. Build a smart factory that manages logistics automatically. Trade, negotiate, and fight with Colonists, Rebels, Terrorists, and Pirates.

name: Grim Tales: The Nomad
description: Your sister Luisa once again needs your investigative help to solve a bizarre series of robberies plaguing her museum and others around the city. No one has seen the suspects come and they’ve left few clues behind. Use your powers to travel to the past and uncover the culprits. But be careful, you’ll also uncover a shocking revelation about the Gray family in this heartwarming hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Au-Delà
description: Au-Delà is an indie horror puzzle game where the main objective is to find your parents. For this purpose, you will have to explore the entire house, collect information and items, without dying, by solving puzzles or confronting monsters. Au-Delà takes the side of a 2D side view, offering a new experience by making you discover another way to appreciate the dark atmosphere of a horror game. It is especially intended for players who like to explore, solve mysteries and who are not afraid of monsters at night.

name: Delia's Adventure
description:
A Story where nothing goes wrong.

This is a game made with the criteria of only having 3 colors and 3 buttons (left, right, jump).

name: Heat Death
description: Build your deck, re-write your cards, and battle against strange planet-sized apparitions! This single-player game features procedurally generated worlds where your resourcefulness and creativity will be put to the test, as you explore the countless possibilities within it.

name: Birding Simulator
description: Birding Simulator is a first-person photography-exploration game. Get your camera ready, adjust parameters, and gear up to capture unique and rare bird species. Explore varied landscapes and catch the best moments in your photos. Become the best birder in the world!

name: Sockpuppet Noire
description: Step into the shoes of Frank Sockowski, private detective, and explore the gritty world of New Drawer, a wolly unsettling and corrupt city.

name: We are Eva
description: Play the game in multiple dimensions at the same time, traveling between them whenever you like! Doesn't it sound fun? My name is Eva, by the way, I'm the main protagonist of the game you're looking at, and I promise we'll have fun. If you add me to your wishlist, of course. *wink wink*

name: The Words Within
description: Sin descripción

name: Darkwaronline
description: Darkwaronline is a sci-fi RPG game the game was designed mainly as MMORPG where you drive your chosen robot, it can be manually or with the automated combat system.

name: The Voluptuous Demon Queen and our Shoebox Apartment Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Mushy
description: Mushy is a round-based first-person shooter. The attackers plant a bomb and the defenders defuse it; all while engaging in armed combat!

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu
description: The original Japanese arcade version of the game which would be later be recognized as Super Dodge Ball.

name: Super Dodge Ball
description: Super Dodge Ball is the localization for the Japanese Arcade game Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu.

name: Downtown Special: Kunio-kun no Jidaigeki Da yo Zenin Shuugou!
description: The Game Boy port of the Famicom game of originally released under the same name.

name: XZR II: Kanketsu-hen
description: XZR II depicts the further adventures of Sadler after the events of the previous game. Now living in the time of the Christian Crusades, Sadler makes an attempt to unite the world under one God and achieve world peace. Exile is a remake of XZR II which rewrites most of the story.

name: The Burgle Cats
description: The Battle Cats take on a new challenge as... Cat burglars?! Sneak into player generated rival mansions in hopes of stealing fame and fortune as you climb your way to the top of the Burgle Leagues by using a whacky assortment of cats and traps. Set up your own devious mansion using traps you've acquired to prevent rivals from successfully heisting your own treasures.

name: Magi: Hajimari no Meikyuu
description: To raise enough capital to purchase a country and to find the Metal of Jin, Alibaba and the genie summoner Aladdin set off to conquer the challenges in the 7th labyrinth Amon. The game is spilt into the adventure part and the battle part. Meet the captivating characters and watch the memorable dialogues in the iconic scenes in the adventure part. And when you have enough information, meet the bosses you have read about in the manga. The parallel mode in the game allows you to create your own team. Use different characters to fight the enemies in the dungeon and unlock special story events.

name: Omega Chronos
description:
What happened to mankind? Why everything is silence? Who are you?

There is only silence. Even these artificial lights are dead. These walls, they are my prison?

name: Mir-Mahna
description: Mir-Mahna is a computer game based on the life of Mir Mahna, an amir of Kharg, Iran who successfully fought against Dutch colonial forces in Iran during the reign of Nader Shah in the 1740s.

name: Safire Eshgh
description:
Safire Eshgh is a third-person action adventure video game made by Iranian center for digital Islamic revolution publishing.

The story is set in the year 61 AH about "Mehran" of Rey an Iranian man who is suffering from past trauma and his meeting with Mukhtar al-Thaqafi.

name: Age of Pahlevans
description: The plotline of Age of Heroes, derived from Ferdowsi's epic the Shahnameh, centers on the efforts of Atar, son of Pishad and commander of the kingdom of Sistan, to fight against demons which have captured and laid waste to much of the region. The game features 110 mythical figures (including Arash, Siavash, Fereidun, Kaveh, Esfandiar, Rustam, and Zal) living in nine regions (including Sistan, Sarsabz, Kuhestan, and Atashfeshani)

name: Quest of Persia: The End of Innocence
description: The story begins with Iraq attacking Iran from the air, sea and land. Arashk who is an engineer working in Petrochemical plant, gets caught in the attacks, and has to escape the factory while it's burning into ashes. He meets Leyla an archeologist who is working in the desert. She is trying to find out the secrets of Ancient Persian Sites. Together they have to fight the Iraqi Invasion army, while trying to solve the mystery of Ancient Sites. Arashk and Leyla find a manuscript which provides them with information about secrets of Ancient Persian Sites. It gives them a clue about the famous battle of Agha Mohammad Khan Ghajar and Lotfali Khan Zand.

name: Quest of Persia: Lotfali Khan Zand
description: The story happens in the 17th century when the Agha Mohammad Khan Ghajar controls the north and central part of Iran. After Lotfali Khan Zand has been betrayed by his minister Ebrahim Kalantar and loses his capital Shiraz, he decides to take the fortress close to the capitol called Zarghan and make it his command center. Little that he knew Ebrahim Kalantar, and Agha Mohammad Khan Ghajar prepared a huge assault on Zarghan. He escapes to Kerman, where the second part of the game takes place...

name: Special Operation 85: Hostage Rescue
description: Two young Iranian nuclear scientists, Saeed and his wife Maryam, are kidnapped by US military forces while on a religious pilgrimage to Karbala, Iraq, and are sent to a prison in Israel. Bahram Nasseri, an Iranian special operations agent, is sent to Israel to save the scientists and four other Iranians. While in Israel, Nasseri also exposes an Israeli-Iranian responsible for leaking classified information about Iran's nuclear program to Western powers. The name of Nasseri's mission is "The Special Operation".

name: Re;flection
description:
A mobile puzzle game featuring a high speed spaceship that can only move forward. Adjust the ship's starting position and the stage mirrors to successfully navigate to the goal.

The game features 100 levels, as well as a stage editor and the ability to upload and download user generated levels for endless replayability.

name: Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari EX
description: This game is the remake of Downtown Nekketsu Story (the original Japanese version of River City Ransom). It was later ported as River City Ransom EX for Western audiences.

name: Lonely Hero & Non-Fight Party
description:
A lone hero tries to recruit a party and save the world. There's just one problem... they're all lazy bums addicted to gambling. Can our lonely hero save the world by himself?

Part idle clicker, part casino mini-games. Fight monsters with the Hero while earning gold gambling at the casino with his slacker party to afford new equipment.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: PC Soccer-hen
description: The PC Engine port of Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story. This version is not the same version the PC Engine CD game.

name: Nekketsu Kakutou Densetsu
description: The Japanese mobile version of Nekketsu Fighting Legend.
An obscure shoot em' up game released during Comiket 87. All of the text in-game uses an alien language that makes it impossible to understand.

name: Asuka 120% Burning Fest. Excellent
description: Asuka 120% Excellent Burning Fest. is a side-scrolling fighting game.

name: Fallen London: The Attendants
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for August, 2017. Third and final entry in the Season of Ruins.

name: Fallen London: Trial and Error
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for September, 2017. First entry in the Season of Scepters.

name: Fallen London: The Stone Guest
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for October, 2017. Second entry in the Season of Scepters.

name: Fallen London: The Sinking Synod
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2017. Third and final entry for the Season of Sceptres.

name: Fallen London: Steeped in Honey
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for December, 2017. First story in the Season of Silver.

name: Fallen London: Lamentation Lock
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for January, 2018. Second entry in the Season of Silver.

name: Quraish
description: Quraish: The game is a 2005 real-time strategy 3D computer video game produced by Syrian video game production, Afkar Media. It is the second Arabic language-based game and a third person strategy game based on the early battles of Islam, primarily focusing on the Rashidun Caliphate's successful campaigns against the Eastern Roman Empire and the Sassanid dynasty of Persia.

name: Les Grandes Odalisques
description:
This is the tale of Alexia, a princess, and Eli, a female military cadet—two best friends who have grown up supporting each other through thick and thin.

Our story begins as the First World War looms over a small European country. One day, a central diplomatic figure sends Alexia as an envoy to a great nation in the East: Anatolia, a large and fearsome empire that once threatened all of Europe.

There, the two women come face-to-face with the concubines of the Imperial Harem hidden deep within the palace... an event that sets an entirely new destiny into motion.

Torn between their duty and their hearts' true desires, what will they choose—and what will they leave behind?

name: Arabians Doubt: The Engagement on Desert
description: Set after the normal route in Arabian’s Lost where you win the bet but don’t get a husband. Eileen finds herself forced to act as ruler after her parents take off one day on a trip.

name: Koi wa Alf Laylah
description:
There was once a lone princess in a kingdom surrounded by a desert far, far away. She'd simply be beautiful if she kept silent but most of the time she was a tsundere. As if to hide her tender nature deep in her heart, she was a tomboy always doing whatever she wanted. At such a princess' side was her loyal manservant.

Spoiled by and dependent on her servant, the princess lived a peaceful life, free and uncontrolled.
Until one day, her father declared:

"You will marry the prince of our neighboring kingdom."

Unsurprisingly, the princess didn't accept such a sudden declaration of marriage.

"I will never, ever get married!!"

So, this tsundere princess...
Was to meet the prince to arrange their marriage.
And by her side was her loyal servant.

From where will the flower of love bloom...!?

name: Street Fighter 6
description:
The evolution of fighting games starts with our traditional Fighting Ground, and then we're turning the genre on its head with World Tour and Battle Hub for a total of three modes where anyone can play to their liking.

No one starts off as a champion. You get there step by step, punch by punch.
Take up the challenge and bring your game to the next level.

name: Koi Iro Rabian Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: Custom Maid 3D
description: Custom Maid 3D is a simulation game where you train your own made maid through specific activities.

name: Gartic.io
description:
Welcome to Gartic.io! Playing Gartic.io you are gonna have fun guessing and drawing! Every round a Player is chosen to draw something for the others to guess what it is. The first player to achieve the goal of points will be declared the game winner. Choose between one of the groups of words that we offer and have fun with your friends!

Gartic also allows the player to create his own room and invite up to 50 friends sharing a link to the room. Choose one between the different room subjects to draw and have fun!

name: Extrapower Star Resistance
description: An indie shoot 'em up from doujin team Lucky Lamp that takes place in the Extrapower universe. Prior to the events of Attack of Darkforce, Sharkungo and Force Star respond to a report that Dark Force is attacking the Shakun Star itself. Traverse across 6 stages from the Satellite Mesa to the heart of the royal capital city to fight through swarms of enemies and repel the Dark Force attack on Sharkungo's homeworld.

name: Madshot
description: Madshot is a fast-paced, acrobatic, rogue-lite shooter. Survive the ever-changing road through Cthulhu. Equip endless upgrade combinations as you fight your way through horrific monsters and multi-phased boss battles.

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator
description: Create and manage your dream restaurant! Menus, purchasing, décor, staff, equipment, customers… and don't forget the actual cooking! Experience the daily life of a restaurateur and earn your stars from the Michelin Guide.

name: Fallen London: Factory of Favours
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for February, 2018. Third and final entry in the Season of Silver.

name: Fallen London: The Pursuit of Moths
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for March, 2018. First entry in the Season of Adorations.

name: Fallen London: The Murgatroyd Formula
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for April, 2018. Second entry in the Season of Adorations.

name: Fallen London: The Rat-Catcher
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for May, 2018. Third and final entry in the Season of Adorations.

name: Fallen London: The Bones of London
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for June, 2018. First entry in the Season of Embers.

name: Fallen London: Written in the Glim
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for July, 2018. Second entry in the Season of Embers

name: Fallen London: Required Repairs
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for August, 2018. Third and final entry in the Season of Embers.

name: Fallen London: For All the Saints Who From Their Labours Rest
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for September, 2018. First entry in the Season of Celebrations.

name: Gulper.Io
description: Welcome to gulper.io, a modern mix of the classic snake and Tron lightcycles games, but against real players this time. It runs directly in your browser, so you don't need to download anything - just enter your nickname and play! In this game you control a slithering snake, or worm, or whatever you call it; your goal is to collect as much energy as possible and don't let others stop you! Avoid collisions, be smart with your strategy, team with other players, and make your way to the top of the global leaderboard!

name: Fallen London: The Magician's Dream
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for October, 2018. Second entry in the Season of Celebrations.

name: Fallen London: A Little Pandemonium
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2018. Third and final entry in the Season of Celebrations.

name: Fallen London: Daylight
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exception Story for December, 2018. First entry in the Season of Hobbies

name: Fallen London: The Price of Loss
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for January, 2019. Second entry in the Season of Hobbies.

name: Ten ni Takaku Chi ni Fukaku
description: Ten ni Takaku Chi ni Fukaku is an independent visual novel game released by nuko, on PC in 2005. There was an official site, but it doesn't exist now. However, the patch has been archived by the fan and is available from (click a link as 修正パッチ)

name: Dungeon Reels Tactics
description: Dungeon Reels Tactics is a challenging party based RPG roguelike with Slot Machine based Combat. Your party members' unique slot machine will supply your abilities each turn. Make the best decisions to succeed in Battle. Lose party members, recruit new ones, and try to reach The "Great Evil".

name: Fallen London: Cricket, Anyone?
description: Addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for February, 2019. Third and final entry in the Season of Hobbies.

name: Fallen London: Noises from Upstairs
description: Addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for March, 2019. First entry in the Season of Explorations.

name: Fallen London: Tauroktonos
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for April, 2019. Second entry in the Season of Explorations.

name: Fallen London: The Stag and the Shark
description: Addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for May, 2019. Third and final entry in the Season of Explorations.

name: Fallen London: The Garden Embassy
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for June, 2019. First entry in the Season of

name: Fallen London: My Kingdom for a Pig
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for July, 2019. Second entry in the Season of Bargains.

name: Fallen London: The Shallows
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for August, 2019. Third and final entry in the Season of Bargains.

name: The UnMaking
description: Carve a path through space and time to the depths of hell in these 33 maps split across three chapters from legendary mapper Scwiba.

name: Mokoko X
description: Nostalgic arcade gameplay remastered! Capture areas and save the girls from various troublemakers.

name: Puzzle & Dragons Nintendo Switch Edition
description: Embark on an epic quest, harnessing the power of appealing monsters and clever puzzle play! Featuring three modes jam-packed with Orb-matching fun: Quest, Player-versus-Player, and Custom!

name: Fallen London: The Heretic of Hollow Street
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story from September, 2019. The first entry in the Season of Propinquity.

name: Fallen London: Say It with Flowers
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for October, 2019. Second entry in the Season of Propinquity.

name: Fallen London: The Committee
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2019. Third and final entry in the Season of Propinquity.

name: Fallen London: Por Una Cabeza
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for December, 2019. The first entry in the Season of Animals.

name: Fallen London: Fine Dining
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for January, 2020. The second entry in the Season of Animals.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Soccer-bu: World Cup-hen
description: Nekketsu Koukou Soccer-bu: World Cup-hen is a Game Boy version of Soccer Story, based on the international version of the game (Nintendo World Cup).

name: Fallen London: Borrowed Glory
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for February, 2020. Third and final story in the Season of Animals.

name: Fallen London: Shades of Yesterday
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for March, 2020. The first entry in the Season of Endeavours.

name: Fallen London: Go Tell the King of Cats
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for April, 2020. Second entry in the Season of Endeavours.

name: Spiritlink Tactics
description: Spiritlink Tactics is a story driven, tactical turn-based RPG. Lead your party of mercenaries through strategic battles! Customize each party member with numerous classes and skills!

name: Soul Hackers 2
description: Soul Hackers 2 takes place in the 21st Century and is set during a war between the Yagaratsu and the Phantom Society, two opposing factions of Devil Summoners. The story follows two supernatural "Aion" beings named Ringo and Figue, who descend into the human world from their birthplace in the data stream of information, in order to avert a cataclysmic event that they predict will doom humanity

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: PC Bangai-hen
description: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: PC Bangai-hen is the PC Engine port of the Arcade game under the same title.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu
description: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu is the Sharp X68000 port of the Arcade game under the same title.

name: Nintendo World Cup
description: Nintendo World Cup is the Western localization of Nekketsu Koukou Soccer Bu: World Cup Hen.

name: Capcom Fighting Collection
description: Capcom Fighting Collection is a compilation of arcade versions of ten fighting games originally developed and published by Capcom. It adds new features to the original games such as online play with rollback netcode, training and spectator modes, save states, concept art, design documents, and a music player.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: Soccer-hen
description: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball Bu: Soccer-hen is a port for the Sharp X68000 of the Famicom game with under the same title in Japanese.

name: Wylde Flowers
description: Join Tara on a heartfelt journey to become a witch in Wylde Flowers. Farm by day, and cast spells by night as you craft your cottagecore life and bond with your coven. Come to know and love the fully voice acted characters of Fairhaven, as you unravel a local mystery.

name: The Life of Saint Fiona Bianco Xena
description:
In the rubble of the Syxtercian cathedral you find 3 shell vials containing experimental hormones harvested from slugs. They used to belong to Saint Fiona Bianco Xena - Mother of the Motherless, patron saint of the voiceless.

You hear distant whispers, entangled with the melted beats of early Molluscwave. They tell the story of many wounds and many adventures : flesh consumed by a rare blue speckled gutter slug, bioplastic mixed with piss under the light of a half moon, crystal eyes winking provocatively at the face of God, children saved and revolutions lost.

name: Extrapower Giant Fist
description: Third game in the EXTRAPOWER series by doujin group Lucky Lamp. A strange wind blows across the savannas of Africa, driving the animals into a frenzy, so Zophy and his friends set out on the trail of a mysterious bracelet of uncertain origins and the competing factions that seek to exploit its power. Additional characters are unlocked that add additional perspective to the plot and their own play styles.

name: Fallen London: The Ballad of Johnny Croak
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for May, 2020. Third and final story of the Season of Endeavours.

name: Extrapower Attack of Darkforce
description: Following the conquest of the Shakun Star, galactic conqueror Dark Force sets his sights on the planet Earth. Sharkungo flees to warn the humans before the arrival of the invasion force, thus beginning a journey across the planet to collect allies from across the Extrapower series to protect the Earth and bring an end to Dark Force's ambitions. Over 20 heroes are playable across 53 episodes a strategy RPG styled after tokusatsu, anime and manga.

name: Fallen London: The Dilettante's Debut
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for June, 2020.

name: Wonder Boy Collection
description: Four classic games from SEGA's influential platforming series

name: Saturn
description:
Saturn was an arcade game released in August 1983 in Japan.
Developed by Zilec for Jaleco.

name: Final Vendetta
description: Final Vendetta is a hard-hitting action packed beat ‘em up for 1 or 2 players in the vein of classic arcade titles. Featuring stunning pixel art and a thumping soundtrack with exclusive tracks from Utah Saints! Brawl with bad dudes and tough girls as you fight through dangerous environments.

name: Final Vendetta: Collector's Edition
description:
Final Vendetta is a hard-hitting action packed beat ‘em up for 1 or 2 players in the vein of classic arcade titles. Featuring stunning pixel art and a thumping soundtrack with exclusive tracks from Utah Saints! Brawl with bad dudes and tough girls as you fight through dangerous environments.

Collector's Edition includes:
- Deck of 32 Collectible Character Cards complete with bio and stats to compete
-The Original Soundtrack featuring the music of Utah Saints and Featurecast
- A radical "Bin Chicken" sticker!

name: Soul Hackers 2: 25th Anniversary Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Soul Hackers 2
- Three-disc 25th Anniversary Music Album
- 100-page 25th Anniversary Book
- Aiho-kun Figure
- Special Costume & Demon Fusion DLC

name: CBS: Desolation
description: Build, defend your sanctum, gather resources and survive in this post apocalyptic simulated survivor

name: Wannabe Challenge
description: Find your heart-throbbing romance with hidden fates through the best romantic story RPG!

name: Minishoot' Adventures
description: Minishoot' is a cute and unique adventure game that mixes up open exploration with crispy twin-stick shooter action. Fight your way from the shiny overworld to the deepest caves, improve your ship and overcome the dungeons' bosses to rescue your friends!

name: Mannequin the Passing
description: Mannequin The Passing is a single-player psychological horror game. Get through the stages watching the mannequins carefully as some show signs of wanting to stop you. Use patience and observational skills to get through and survive the passing mannequin experience.

name: Duels
description: Duels is a high energy RPG PVP game, but with a difference: the unique auto-battle system means anybody can play and fight monsters. Choose your favorite medieval fighter/warrior, use the weapons, and prepare for epic multiplayer clan arena battles online! Want to challenge yourself further? Enter the dungeons at your peril and fight your way through hordes of cool and dangerous monsters.

name: Furquest
description: A cute and cozy RPG where every enemy has their own unique minigame, and where there are two sides to every soul: Main and Invert!

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Season of the Risen
description:
The Witch Queen has stolen the Light. Her Hive army charges across the battlefield, gnashing at your armor before succumbing to the power of your fireteam. The Ghosts of your vanquished foes hover silently, an ominous portent of a battle with no end. In a matter of moments too short to catch your breath, the horde rises before you and charges again.

Eyes up, Guardian.

name: Return of Touhou Mother
description: Return of Touhou Mother is a sequel to the indie adventure RPG Touhou Mother. It takes place six months after the events of Touhou Mother and 1 year after the events of EarthBound.

name: SquareMan
description: SquareMan has fallen off a cliff and into a the Caverns of Squared. Attain willpower and escape via the bridge atop the mountain in SquareMan, a punishing 2D precision platformer. Beware the spikes and slopes that may either break or make your spirit in this dangerous journey.

name: Chain Cube
description: Sin descripción

name: Dropdom: Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
This is a block puzzle game.
Move the jewel horizontally, fill the jewel with a line and remove the high score.
This game is fun and strategic.
It requires the player to observe, judge, move and finally reach a line or lines.
Delete a line and score, if you delete multiple lines you will get a higher score.
If the player's jewel reaches the top, the game ends.

name: Project Makeover
description: Come to the rescue of those in need and give them a makeover so they can achieve their dreams! Choose the most chic clothes, hairstyles, makeup and even furniture! Take on histrionic characters like egotistical fashion icons, conniving assistants, or headstrong clients in need of a new wardrobe. Solve complex fashion puzzles to find the perfect look. And don't forget to customize your avatar to create your own style!

name: Shroomchitect
description: A relaxing creative game where you care for your shroomies like virtual pets and help them build a cute home in a big mushroom and take pictures!

name: Fallen London: Paisley
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for July, 2020.

name: Fallen London: Unto Dust
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for August, 2020.

name: Fallen London: Homecoming
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for September, 2020.

name: Dwarf Complete
description: Dwarf Complete is a puzzle problem-solving game featuring dwarfs which appear in on-line RPG game. The challenge level is mid-high and it has the auto-save features, meaning you can stop or start it as you like.

name: House Flipper 2
description: It's time to dust off your hammer - House Flipper is back in a brand-new fashion! Buy and renovate run-down houses! Or maybe you want to build new ones? Now you can! Start as a rookie Flipper and make a fortune by helping out the community of the charming town of Pinnacove.

name: There's No Such Thing As Bad Publicity
description: A fully-voiced story mod for Fallout 3, There's No Such Thing As Bad Publicity adds a new quest line involving pre-War secrets in the nation's capital, and several new locations to explore.

name: Agony Online
description: Agony Online is the world's first ever mix of MMORPG & 10,000 Player Battle Royale on a monumental scale that is made by independent developers that want to play their own game. Players can choose to join Battle Royale, or continue playing the Horror MMORPG.

name: Cat Detective Albert Wilde
description: Cat Detective Albert Wilde is a comedy game, a genre-bending noirish sci-fi mystery set in a fictional version of New York in the 1930's featuring atmospheric black & white vintage visuals, and loveable anthropomorphic characters. Players must muddle their way through a murder mystery that's messier than a fresh hairball, with a captivating voice-over and at least one joke about cat nipples (they have six!).

name: Switchcraft
description: In this match 3 adventure set in a 21st-century wizarding world, you’ll meet witches who will become your closest friends… and others who may betray you! It’s up to you how your mystery unfolds.

name: Nekketsu Dodgeball-bu i
description: Kunio-kun dodgeball title released in Japan for i-mode cellphones.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Online: Yamada no Fukushuu
description: Kunio-kun online game developed by Windysoft which began closed beta testing in 2008 until October 22, 2010.

name: The Meteorite
description: Get a Multiplayer Action Shooter Game experience with your friends and family. Create your own Clans and fight for the best Clan. Create custom rooms as you want and enjoy with your friends. Earn In game Coins while playing The Meteorite and redeem them in the upcoming In Game Shop for new skins, weapons and new characters.

name: Kalyzmyr
description: Kalyzmyr is a short fantasy game about a legendary warrior, Smyrna, escaping from a dungeon called Kalyzmyr. The game is a simplistic mix of popular gameplay elements like tower defense, dungeon crawler and hack'n slash with lots of button mashing and random generated interactions and loot. Fight and defend through hordes of demons in this old-school fast-paced action game. Each floor starts with a defense phase where you defend yourself from hordes of creatures by buying and upgrading defensive equipment. Kill monsters to earn money. Loot chests to level up your equipment.

name: Castle of Alchemists
description: In Castle of Alchemists, a tower defense/top-down action hybrid game with amazing pixel art graphics, play as the Bellator, alchemically enhanced defender, to fight against invaders from other worlds. Delve into the castle, set your traps, equip powerful weapons and gears, and reclaim the castle piece by piece.

name: Shroom and Gloom
description:
Descend into the unknown in Shroom and Gloom a first person, dungeon-crawling, deck-building tale of mushrooms and madness.

Enter The Underealm armed with nothing but a rust blade, a dying phone and a healthy appetite for roasted mushrooms. Explore your way through the depths, digging up new weapons in your quest to reach The Megashroom at all costs! Combine, grow and enchant your discoveries as you battle your way through terrifying Terry's, enchanting Bardshrooms and otherworldly Pizza Blobs!

name: Solar Colonies
description:
Tame the unstable climates of barren and inhabitable planets, then colonize them!
Get supplies (plants, building, etc.) by collecting and exchanging your new colonists for them!

name: Tales of the Drunken Paladin
description: Tales of the Drunken Paladin is a fantasy-comedy RPG about a universally disliked hero who very suddenly loses absolutely everything - including his identity - and must go on a quest to find out who's responsible. It's also largely a game about interacting with thousands of inanimate objects. One full playthrough is between 40-60 hours. Once you've beaten the game, hard mode is unlocked.

name: Barb
description: Experience the life of Barbara, an ordinary person with very normal daily rituals... or is there more to it

name: Music Thief
description: Music Thief is a top-down shooter where you need to destroy all the benchmarks on the spot. Your house is your fortress, clear it of thieves. Each one threatens your image as a musician. The traps in the next house have already worked, they can hurt you, dodge and shoot all the benchmarks.

name: Swing the Universe
description: Use a grappling hook to discover different colorful and soothing environments. Easy to learn, hard to master, this game will let you progress at your own pace!

name: Rising Mist
description: Rising Mist is a story driven adventure set in the fantasy land of Occoterra where dark magic and evil forces have descended upon. To oppose the tyranny one must gain an alliance of the seven cities. Develop skills and trades, skilfully navigate between the intrigues of allies and enemies.

name: Timruk
description: Sin descripción

name: Ardenfall
description: Ardenfall is a first-person RPG set in a world of intricate politics and ancient cultures. Explore rain-drenched wetlands and forgotten dungeons full of danger. Meet countless interesting characters with unique dialog and quests, and leave your mark on this mysterious world.

name: Z-Rush Survival
description: Survive in your Virtual Reality (VR) space in this Horror-Thriller based shooting Game. Stay alive by shooting down Zombies that surround you at 360 degree angle.

name: Everplast
description: Dash, sprint, or take it slow. Name of the game is simple, make it to the end. Find out the real reason why these worlds were created just for you. In Everplast, all is supposed to be simple, that is, if you can make it through without raging.

name: Maze Twister
description: Rotate the maze to make the ball reach the destination.

name: Hamster Blitz!
description: Hamster Blitz! is a wave defense game where you and up to 3 other friends work together to defend your household from waves of devious rats.

name: The Adventures of Mr. Hat
description: "The Adventures of Mr. Hat" is an interesting side-scrolling puzzle game with a minimalist design and a wealth of entertaining levels. This game is easy to start and each level has a different way to pass. These levels will blow your mind and develop your imagination!

name: Dungeon Crawler
description: Dungeon Crawler is a round-based, third-person, rogue-like, fantasy-style, atmospheric indie game. On your journey through a set of caves and rooms you will slay monsters, loot equipment and gain XP to level up and access perks that help you grow and sustain.

name: Dreaming Rainbow
description: This is a horror game where you walk through the 3D hospital space and solve mysteries. You will experience a nurse day in the nurse's view. Mysterious phenomena occur frequently. Through the experience, the truth comes to light.

name: Reef Rivals
description: Prepare yourself for the hottest pool party of 2022! Slip into your best costume, grab your friends and fight for the trophy in many different chaotic levels!

name: Wrath of Anias
description: Explore the sandbox, collect treasures, and find your way off of the island.

name: Zadel Princess
description: Do you like to challenge yourself with interesting quizzes while experiencing the JRPG elements, building characters, and forming squads to overcome the scary monsters.

name: Afterlife Work
description: AfterLife Work is a 3d arcade game with a first-person view, a time runner where you run around the location of Purgatory and have dialogues with the souls of the dead, asking them to sign your petition. Someone refuses, someone agrees, but your time is limited, so... hurry up!

name: Squarena
description: Squarena is a skill-based party game with an emphasis on physics combat. The game mechanics support ease of entry with a high skill ceiling. Have you ever wanted to prove to your friends who the best colorfully decorated square combatant is? If so, this is the game for you!

name: Crabby Beach
description: Crabby beach - Crab migration season is in full swing! You need to help the main character get to the water, bypassing dangerous obstacles and intrigues of poachers who want to shoot as many crabs as possible!
